text: Eric Frederick D'Ath (25 March 1897 – 18 June 1979) was a New Zealand pathologist, and was professor of pathology and medical jurisprudence at the University of Otago from 1929 until 1962. In the 1965 Queen's Birthday Honours, D'Ath was appointed a Commander of the Order of the British Empire, in recognition of his services as professor of pathology and medical jurisprudence at the University of Otago. In 1975, he was conferred an honorary Doctor of Science degree by the University of Otago. ==References== Category:1897 births Category:1979 deaths Category:People from Patea Category:University of Otago alumni Category:University of Otago faculty Category:New Zealand pathologists Category:New Zealand Commanders of the Order of the British Empire
title: Eric D'Ath
